description:
Reach mojo::system::CoreImpl::Init() on Android

This CL adds enough machinery on Android so that we can initialize mojo_system.
There's still more work to do to actually load and execute the sample program.

R=darin@chromium.org,aa@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=230982

messages.text: Ok, this is ready for review.  PTAL.  Thanks!

Seems reasonable to me. LGTM

https://codereview.chromium.org/42613002/diff/70001/mojo/shell/android/mojo_main.cc

https://codereview.chromium.org/42613002/diff/70001/mojo/shell/android/mojo_main.cc#newcode1

nit: no (c), and 2012->2013

> Seems reasonable to me. LGTM

> All rights reserved.
> nit: no (c), and 2012->2013

Sorry.  We seem to have a bunch of files with the (c).  I keep copy and pasting it.  :)
I fixed the (c) issue for all the C++ and Java files in the mojo directory.  There's still some in the Python and XML, but I left those for another day.
